name: Low Poly Racer
description:
Low Poly Racer

How many vertices have been removed from our world? It looks like a game now!

*Note to players"

This is just a prototype and experimental game and is at it's earliest stage of development. Right now, game play is very limited

At the present, this game includes multiple vehicles to be driven. The "minibus" and "taxi" are vehicles of Hong Kong public transportation. We would add more vehicles from different regions across the country in the future

Full release proposal of this game would include feature such as cop chase, ghost race, creative, gold collect, multiplayer and more. More maps, cars, AI and realism would be added in the future if this project is continued

It's continuance is however, yet to be decided

We will consider whether it should reach a full development stage, so provide some comments on your expectations
